summary: Arasaka WMA Minami 10-The standard Arasaka Security weapon, found worldwide. An "Uzi in an MP7A2 body kit" chambered in 10×25mm...
caption: Arasaka WMA Minami 10-The standard Arasaka Security weapon, found worldwide. An “Uzi in an MP7A2 body kit” chambered in 10×25mm Auto. Most notable on the Minami 10 is the integration of manufactured product and often crude hand crafted fabricated parts.  Blackhand’s Street Weapons 2020 500 ED, V. Lady’s 10 features a GG&G Vertical Foregrip, H&K suppressor, Aimpoint Micro T2 red dot sight with custom picatinny rail mount on a quad RIS.

title: Cyberpunk 2077 Cinsiyet Eşitciliğine Vurgu Yapacak - teknotechnic
excerpt: CD Projekt RED tarafından uzun bir süredir hazırlanan Cyberpunk 2077 için yeni bilgiler gelmeye devam ediyor. Bu kez de oyunda insanların birbirleriyle olan ilişkilerine yönelik bazı açıklamalar yapıldı. Oyun içerisinde pek çok aşk ilişkisine şahitlik edebileceksiniz. Karakterin aşk hayatı, kullanıcının seçimlerine göre şekillenebilecek. Hatırlarsanız The Witcher serisinde de aynı şey vardı. CD Projekt RED o …

blog.name: space-collector-void
blog.title: Stop sending me death threats
blog.description: I'm 16. please leave me alone. if you want to talk, dm me. anon is off

body:
Last words about C*berpunk 2077

Hi there fellas! So recently, I have gotten into a bit of…

Discourse…

Over a meme that i made a couple weeks ago. In this meme I made a picture that seemed to make a lot of people angry, causing an endless flow of furious criticism. I have been called a twat, SJW, a clown, an idiot, a retard, a brat and many other names over the past 2 weeks. I have deleted the post along with many replies plus I’m trying to delete more replies as I see them.

Now, this is not an apology. I don’t have anything to apologise about except the people who were genuinely offended by the picture and the people who were affected by it. Otherwise, I’m not going to say sorry to the thousands of upset gamers for being rude to a game that’s already going to make millions just for having an A-list actor in it that has already 3 movies and a fortnite skin. Said actor is probably never going to see the post because he’s too busy to be trifled with a tumblr post made by a 16 year old that makes homestuck fantrolls for a living.

That being said, there has been a bigger issue at hand: I have been getting numerous anons and messaged telling me quite colorful things. I am a CSA victim as you may or may not know, meaning my childhood was pretty fucking shitty and I happened to experience some heavy trauma because of it. So imagine me waking up to find people telling me that they are going to rape me, kill me, hurt my brother, and kill my mother. It’s pretty terrifying. I said something about it and i got back a 50/50 mix of my friends and mutuals telling me that its fucked up how people are sending me those things… and people telling me that I deserve it.

Because of this, I want to conclude on something that I drew out of all this. Something that I learned from the numerous death threats and suicide baits that I have gotten from people who are full adults…

I hate cyberpunk 2077. From the bottom of my heart, I never hated a game so much. Keanu Reeves is a good man and I wont deny that but I absolutely, positively hate the dumb technology game. Not because of the transphobia, or the racism, or even the dumb tweets that one guy made. But because of the fact that I made a single meme about the goddamn game being apparently “misinformed” and “nit picky” on my own god damn post.

I hope, and you all can quote me on this in your callout post about the SJW tucute wario gendered bitch that is myself, that Cyberpunk 2077 fails. I hope it crashes right into the ground because it’s fans are the most toxic, benevolent and dumbest pieces of shit that I’ve ever seen. You all say the SJW’s are the most easily triggered but you’re the ones sending death threats to a fucking 16 year old about a meme that doesn’t even affect you, you dumbasses.

Anyways, I’m tired. This is the last I’ll be speaking about this issue. If I get ANY more questions about this or anything related to it or the fact that you all think its okay for an adult and minor to date, then please know that I hate you and that I will respond with a picture of my little brother.

Good bye.

summary: Los usuarios de PS4 pueden descargar gratis este tema de Cyberpunk 2077
title: Los usuarios de PS4 pueden descargar gratis este tema de Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Los usuarios de PS4 pueden descargar gratis este tema de Cyberpunk 2077

Sony y CD Projekt RED han lanzado un regalo para los usuarios de PlayStation 4. Se trata de un tema estático para el fondo de nuestro menú de la consola. Incluye efectos de sonido, iconos y música personalizada.

https://twitter.com/CyberpunkGame/status/1143579861971341312

Para haceros con él sólo tenéis que acceder a este enlacey añadirlo al carrito. Luego procedéis a pasar a caja y pedir…

View On WordPress

description:
So guys,

summary: CD Projekt Red kaže da će možda implementirati VR podršku u Cyberpunk 2077
title: CD Projekt Red kaže da će možda implementirati VR podršku u Cyberpunk 2077
body:
CD Projekt Red kaže da će možda implementirati VR podršku u Cyberpunk 2077

U svim dosadašnjim trejlerima i prikazima gejmpleja smo videli kako je svet u Cyberpunk 2077 neverovatno detaljno izrađen i od njegove lepote nam prosto zastaje dah.

Ono što je mnoge fanove zanimalo je da li će Cyberpunk biti moguće igrati i sa VR uređajem. VR podrška bi bila stvarno kul element za ovakvu igru, i CD Projekt Red je toga svestan.

Na pitanje fanova da li mogu očekivati da igraju…

View On WordPress
